Class VTimelineBrowserScroller

java.lang.Object

          com.vaadin.addon.timeline.gwt.client.VTimelineBrowserScroller
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget
public class VTimelineBrowserScroller
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget

VTimelineBrowserScroller is the scroller widget in timeline browser.

setLeftPosition

public void setLeftPosition(float pos)
Set the left position of the scrolling area relative to the canvas. Does not affect the width of the area

Parameters:
pos - The position in pixels relative to the canvas

setRightPosition

public void setRightPosition(int pos)
Set the right position of the scrolling area relative to the left position. Affects the width of the scrolling area

Parameters:
pos - The position relative to the left position in pixels

move

public void move(int amount)
Moves scroller given amount of pixels. If amount is positive, scroller is moved to right, if negative scroller is moved to left.

Parameters:
amount -

adjustLeftSideSize

public void adjustLeftSideSize(int amount)
Adjust the left edge of the selection with an amount of pixels

Parameters:
amount - The amount of pixels to adjust with. Negative pixels move the edge left while positive pixels move the edge right

adjustRightSideSize

public void adjustRightSideSize(int amount)
Adjust the right edge of the selection with an amount of pixels

Parameters:
amount - The amount of pixels to adjust with. Negative pixels move the edge left while position pixels move the edge right
